description: A client of Insight Global is looking for a Data Engineer to join their team in Orlando, FL. The engineer will be responsible for migrating data from an old system to a new one. They will apply practical knowledge of development and engineering to conceive, design, develop, test, and implement data extracts, transformation, migration, and uploads. This will be done using modern software development paradigms (e.g., agile, product, cloud). The ideal candidate will also have report/dashboarding development experience using MicroStrategy Cloud Environment.
